pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation of Natural Regeneration Potential // Functions for estimating the potential dispersal of tree species using regeneration densities and dispersal distances to nearest seed trees. A quantile regression is implemented to determine the dispersal potential. Spatial prediction can be used to identify natural regeneration potential for forest restoration as described in Axer et al (2021) doi:10.1016/j.foreco.2020.118802.
